### Digital Scheduling Risk Assessment Tool (SRAT) Request for Proposal

#### Reference Information
* Contract Solicitation Number: W6369-22-X018
* Procurement Reference Number: PW-22-01009382
* Amendment Number: 2
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-27T14:00:00
* Publication Date: 2022-10-06

#### Procurement Information

The Department of National Defence (DND) intends to award a single contract for the supply of two (2) perpetual software licences for the purpose of performing Schedule Risk Assessment (SRA). The software must meet certain requirements:

* Directly import native project schedule data from Microsoft Project, Oracle Primavera, and Deltek Open Plan
* Perform schedule Monte Carlo analysis
* Perform schedule health analysis

The contract also includes requirements for access to software training, maintenance, and consultation services. All applicable Trade Agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), apply to this procurement.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The basis of selection shall be the compliant bidder that offers the lowest-cost compliant proposal. Bidders are to refer to the Request for Proposal (RFP) document for a detailed description of the evaluation criteria.
